results.prompt_used:
Create a VIRAL WhatsApp Status image with MAXIMUM visual impact:

    Create a viral WhatsApp status image (1080x1920px) showing a simple village man in white kurta with SHOCKED expression, golden divine glow around him. Dark gradient background. Bold yellow text '₹100 CRORE!' at top. Include small village hut in background. Photorealistic style with dramatic lighting. Text overlay: 'VILLAGE BOY ₹100 CRORE!' in 92px bold font, 'Started with ₹500 SIP 20 years ago' in 56px, 'Your turn next?' in 64px red pulsing text. 100px padding all sides. Include subtle branding: 'Shruti Petkar' in #1A73E8 color at bottom, ARN text 'ARN: ARN_SHRUTI_001' in small gray font. Professional financial advisor branding integrated seamlessly.

    TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
    - Dimensions: EXACTLY 1080x1920 pixels (9:16 aspect ratio)
    - Padding: 100px on all sides for WhatsApp UI compatibility
    - Font sizes: Headlines 76-92px, supporting text 48-64px
    - High contrast for mobile viewing
    - Sharp, crisp text that's readable at small sizes

    VIRAL OPTIMIZATION:
    - SHOCKING visual impact within 0.5 seconds
    - Dramatic lighting and colors
    - Clear visual hierarchy: Hook → Stats → Action
    - Professional but eye-catching design
    - Photorealistic elements where specified

    QUALITY STANDARDS:
    - Grammy Award-level visual design
    - 8K resolution quality
    - Perfect typography alignment
    - Consistent brand integration
    - Mobile-first optimization

    Style: Professional financial marketing with viral social media aesthetics
